title: Heat Illness Prevention
description: Review of heat stress symptoms recognition treatment and prevention measures including hydration schedules shade requirements and buddy system monitoring.
notes: Mandatory for all field workers due to summer heat advisory. Water coolers restocked at all stations.

title: Fall Protection Refresher
description: Review of fall protection requirements for steel erection including proper harness inspection tie-off points and rescue procedures for work above 6 feet.
notes: Required before Level 3 steel erection begins. All harnesses inspected and tagged.

title: Crane Safety and Signal Communication
description: Proper hand signals for crane operations load chart review and communication protocols between operator rigger and signal person.
notes: Conducted prior to exhibition hall truss lifting operations. Signal person certification verified.

title: Silica Dust Exposure Control
description: OSHA silica rule requirements exposure monitoring wet cutting methods respiratory protection requirements and medical surveillance program.
notes: Required for concrete cutting and grinding operations. Dust monitoring results reviewed.

title: Confined Space Entry Procedures
description: Review of permit-required confined space program including atmospheric testing ventilation requirements rescue procedures and entry permit completion.
notes: Required before utility tunnel and chase work begins on MEP phase.

title: Marine Safety and Man Overboard
description: Personal flotation device requirements marine emergency procedures man overboard response and rescue boat deployment for over-water construction operations.
notes: Mandatory for all marine construction workers. PFD inspection and fitting conducted.

title: Pile Driving Noise Protection
description: Hearing conservation program requirements noise monitoring results proper ear protection selection and fitting and communication methods in high-noise areas.
notes: Noise monitoring showed 92dB average. Double hearing protection required within 50 feet of pile driver.

title: Work Zone Traffic Safety
description: Proper traffic control setup flagging procedures emergency vehicle access and worker positioning relative to live traffic lanes.
notes: Required for all workers due to active roadway adjacent to bridge construction zone.

title: Over-Water Safety Procedures
description: Work over water requirements including PFD usage safety net installation rescue boat positioning and emergency response for water-related incidents.
notes: Conducted before start of pier demolition work over Cedar Creek.

title: Electrical Safety for Medical Facilities
description: Special electrical safety requirements for healthcare construction including lockout tagout for hospital systems and working near energized medical equipment.
notes: Required before MEP rough-in begins. Hospital electrical safety officer provided input.

title: Hurricane Preparedness
description: Procedures for securing construction site materials equipment and temporary structures in advance of tropical storm or hurricane conditions.
notes: Annual hurricane season preparation. Tie-down points and material staging areas reviewed.
